> Hi Kaisa,

resolving kitarapaja.com address. Do you see
evidence of

wl log or local errors? If this is the case, then

a.com has been discovered via some other path.

 then this is probably not obvious since 
> browser.fixup.alternate.prefix =
feature is probably setup to 'www.'.
This 
> feature automatically tries al=
ternative host by adding 'www.' to the
